00016 // Type for Sass values
00017 enum Sass_Tag {
00018   SASS_BOOLEAN,
00019   SASS_NUMBER,
00020   SASS_COLOR,
00021   SASS_STRING,
00022   SASS_LIST,
00023   SASS_MAP,
00024   SASS_NULL,
00025   SASS_ERROR,
00026   SASS_WARNING
00027 };
00028 
00029 // Tags for denoting Sass list separators
00030 enum Sass_Separator {
00031   SASS_COMMA,
00032   SASS_SPACE
00033 };

00035 // Return the sass tag for a generic sass value
00036 // Check is needed before accessing specific values!
00037 ADDAPI enum Sass_Tag ADDCALL sass_value_get_tag (const union Sass_Value* v);

00114 // Generic destructor function for all types
00115 // Will release memory of all associated Sass_Values
00116 // Means we will delete recursively for lists and maps
00117 ADDAPI void ADDCALL sass_delete_value (union Sass_Value* val);
00118
